summary: Senior software engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable distributed systems and conducting research in machine learning infrastructure. Passionate about bridging the gap between academic research and production engineering, with a track record of reducing system latency by 60% and improving resource utilization by 40% through innovative architectural solutions.

experience.description: Leading development of real-time analytics platform serving 10M+ daily active users
achievements: Reduced query latency by 60% through distributed caching architecture using Redis and ClickHouse
Mentored team of 5 engineers in microservices best practices and cloud-native development
Designed and implemented gRPC-based service mesh for internal APIs, improving inter-service communication by 40%
Led migration to Kubernetes, reducing infrastructure costs by 35% while improving scalability

experience.description: Built machine learning infrastructure for real-time recommendation systems
achievements: Developed ML feature store serving 1M+ predictions per second with sub-10ms latency
Implemented A/B testing framework used across 20+ product teams
Optimized data pipelines reducing processing time from hours to minutes using Apache Spark

experience.description: Early employee building core product features for B2B SaaS platform
achievements: Built REST API and admin dashboard serving 500+ enterprise customers
Implemented real-time collaboration features using WebSockets
Contributed to 10x user growth through feature development and performance optimization

experience.description: Conducted research on distributed systems and machine learning infrastructure
achievements: Published 2 papers on resource allocation in ML training clusters
Developed prototype achieving 40% improvement in GPU utilization
Presented research at top-tier conferences (OSDI, NSDI)
